resources.string: "Allows this application to read your email attachments."
"Allows this application to access your email database, including received messages, sent messages, usernames and passwords."
"Couldn\'t load the message text. The message may be too large to view."
"Can\'t move because selection contains multiple accounts."
"Messages in Drafts, Outbox and Sent can\'t be moved."
"You must add at least one recipient."
"Note: One or more attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending."
"Pictures from this sender will be shown automatically."
"You can\'t save or open this file because this type of attachment might contain malicious software."
"This attachment can\'t be saved or opened because of this account\'s security policies."
"This attachment is too large to download over a mobile network. You can download it the next time that you connect to a Wi-Fi network."
"There is no installed app that can open this attachment. Try downloading an appropriate app from Android Market."
"This attachment is an app. You must tick Unknown Sources in Settings > Apps before you can install it."
"Apps can\'t be installed directly from email. Save this app first and then install it using the Downloads app."
"There was an error while decoding the message."
"Could not forward one or more attachments"
"You can set up email for most accounts in just a few steps."
"You can set up an Exchange account in just a few steps."
"You can set up an Exchange ActiveSync account in just a few steps."
"Send email from this account by default."
"Type a valid email address and password."
"You\'re already using this username for the account \"%s\"."
"This password starts or ends with one or more space characters. Many servers don\'t support passwords with spaces."
"Your account is set up and email is on its way!"
"Send email from this account by default."
"Automatically download attachments when connected to Wi-Fi"
"Client certificate is required. Connect to server with client certificate?"
"The server responded with an error. Check your username and password and then try again."
"TLS required but not supported by server."
"Couldn\'t open connection to server due to security error."
"You\'ve typed an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Email doesn\'t support."
"You don\'t have permission to sync with this server. Contact your server\'s administrator for more information."
"The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device. Do you want to finish setting up this account?"
"This server requires security features that your Android device doesn\'t support, including: %s"
"You can\'t change an account\'s username. To add an account with a different username, touch Add account."
"WARNING: Deactivating the Email app\'s authority to administer your device will delete all email accounts that require it, along with their email, contacts, calendar events and other data."
"%s requires you to update your security settings."
"The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device."
"\"%s\" requires you to change your lock-screen PIN or password."
"Your lock-screen PIN or password has expired."
"You must change your lock-screen PIN or password soon or the data for %s will be erased. Change it now?"
"The data for %s is being erased from your device. You can restore it by changing your lock-screen PIN or password. Change it now?"
"The username or password for %s is incorrect. Update them now?"
"Send email from this account by default"
"Auto-download attachments to recent messages via Wi-Fi"
"Notify in System bar when emails arrive"
"Username, password and other incoming server settings"
"Username, password and other outgoing server settings"
"Edit text that you frequently insert when composing emails"
"Append text to messages that you send"
"The account \"%s\" will be removed from email."
"Account wasn\'t found. It may have been removed."
"Folder wasn\'t found. It may have been removed."

"Only some \"Plus\" accounts include POP access allowing this programme to connect. If you\'re not able to sign in with your correct email address and password, you may not have a paid \"Plus\" account. Launch the web browser to gain access to these email accounts."
"Before setting up this email account, please visit the T-Online website and create a password for POP3 email access."
"Select which screen to show after you delete a message"
"Make \"Reply all\" the default for message replies"
"Pictures in messages won\'t be shown automatically"
"You haven\'t set up an email account yet."
"Some servers may take a long time."
"Background sync for this account is disabled while roaming."
